Perfil · Former

Leonardo Izaias Rodrigues

Former undergraduate

???

Engineering and materials applications.

Natural de um município do interior paulista, juntou-se ao grupo durante a graduação em Engenharia.

Alumni

Born in 2002 in the countryside of São Paulo, Leonardo chose Engineering to explore applied science.

He joined ComputEEL/MatSci as an undergraduate, collaborating on studies and simulations of materials.

Topics of interest: applied engineering problems, materials simulations and data handling.

ComputEEL/MatSci

Computational Materials Science · DEMAR · EEL/USP
